summary.body: This morning I was woken up, in the west end of Ben Jonson, at 5.25 by an electronic alarm followed by a recorded woman's voice saying "Can I have your attention please. Can I have your attention please." There was a further message after that which I couldn't hear. This repeated for nearly ten minutes before stopping part-way through. I assume it's an alarm from some nearby building, and I've heard it occasionally in the past too. Very annoying, and I'm wondering if anyone knows where it comes from?
summary.subject: "Can I have your attention please"
